markdownRemark.html:
Look! I actually made progress on a side project!

I started this blog — entitled “untitled blog” until I can think of a name I like — not only as a way to communicate and hold myself accountable for what I am learning, mulling over, and experiencing.

What I hope to accomplish here

🔅 Document my own learning, thoughts, and experiences
🔅 Learn more about GatsbyJS & specifically GraphQL
🔅 Achieve one of my 2019 goals

How I hope to accomplish the above

☁️ Write and publish pieces once every week
☁️ Alternate the topic / method of each written pieces
☁️ Maintain self-accountability
